file_insights.description: Comprehensive test suite for name normalization utility
Name normalization utility with multiple functions for consistent entity matching

patterns_discovered: Handles edge cases like titles, punctuation, case variations
Supports generating name variants for matching
gotchas_discovered: Complex name parsing requires multiple transformation steps
Need to preserve specific punctuation (like apostrophes)
Handling of professional titles and suffixes
recommendations: Add performance benchmarking for name normalization functions
Consider internationalization support for name parsing
Add more test cases for complex name scenarios
